L

leave() - Method in class chord.Node
Leaves the Chord ring, informing the successor and the predecessor
leaving_nodes(Context<Object>, ContinuousSpace<Object>, double) - Method in class chord.TopologyBuilder
This method removes a variable number of nodes (between min_number_leave and this.min_number_leave + leave_amplitude) from the chord ring periodically; at least one node is left in the ring.
lookup(int, int) - Method in class chord.Node
Performs the lookup of a key in the ring
Lookup - Class in chord
This class provides a useful structure for keeping track of the information related to a lookup operation
Lookup(Integer, Integer, Integer, Double, Integer, TopologyBuilder) - Constructor for class chord.Lookup
Public constructor
lookupMultipleKeys() - Method in class chord.TopologyBuilder
Lookup strategy in which each node looks for a random key
lookupSingleKey() - Method in class chord.TopologyBuilder
Lookup strategy in which all nodes look for the same key (the key is different at every lookup batch)
